name: Blind Car Simulator
description:
This is made by Pepijn Willekens (@PepijnWillekens) and Michel Marsman (@michel_marsman) on the NoScreenJam by The House of Indie

In our Car simulator you drive without seeing where you are going. Use the navigation by the sound of your environment and GPS to reach the destination, and will probably kill some pedestrians on the way.

We build a steering wheel and break- and throttle pedals of wood, and an Arduino to connect it to Unity3D.
